channel.title: 317 [Delta] NPCDROPS.cfg Problem
channel.description:

item.title: 317 [Delta] NPCDROPS.cfg Problem
item.dc:creator: @Pblord7 Pblord7
item.description:
@Pblord7 wrote:

Go to Npchandler.java and search

public double[][] drops = new double[3851][45];

Replace 45 with 90, tell me if it works.
